name: Block Boy (will108)
description:
Can you save the princess from Block Boys brother, as he has taken over the kingdom, locked the princess in a tower and hurt Block Boys feelings...

Block Boy has 36 levels of platform and puzzle fun with all the classic elements of a 2d platformer.

Use arrow or AWD keys for movement and Space bar, Enter & Shift for jumping.
If you have any problems or find any bugs, please let me know.

Thanks
Will
